refnamediv.refpurpose: This function is used to split an imageSet.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [set1 set2 ... setN] = partition(imgSet, groupSizes) [set1 set2 ... setN] = partition(imgSet, groupPercentages) [set1 set2 ... setN] = partition(..., method)

listitem.para: Matrix that specifies size of output sets
Matrix that specifies percentage content of each output set

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function splits an imageSet into two or more imageSets on the basis of the groupSizes or groupPercentages provided.
